TopicTitle: A Mechanic Is Jeb, or "KAS For Almost Everything"

Articles.Content: Could this also get support for RoverDudes stuff?

Hi! I seem to have a problem; I can't use the KAS pipe end points to pump from one KW Rocketry part to another (two SA-2 LFT to be precise). Will this mod make it possible?
